title: Ad Grotesk?!
content: It seems to have dissapeared from all the font shops... does anyone know whats up? Looking for a copy... thanks!
author: SF Highlander

comments.content: Oops, sorry; misunderstood your question. Darn, thought I could actually be helpful.

Is Ad Grotesk a look-alike or alternate name of Akzidenz Grotesk?

Akzidenz Grotesk is still available from Font Factory or Berthold.
Also as 'Basic Commercial' from Linotype. There is a long ugly legal battle over this stuff, as has been discussed on Typophile.
